sections.heading: Children's psychiatric unit; operational control.
sections.text:
After the completion of the construction and equipment of the children's psychiatric unit at Albuquerque by the hospitals and institutions department, as provided by Laws 1975, Chapter 140, the operational control of the children's psychiatric unit shall be by the regents of the university of New Mexico.

History:1953 Comp., § 73-25-3.1, enacted by Laws 1977, ch. 174, § 1.

Compiler's notes.— Laws 1975, Chapter 140 was not compiled, as it was not of a general and permanent nature.

Cross references.— For provisions of the Mental Health and Developmental Disabilities Code,seeChapter 43, Article 1 NMSA 1978.
